title: EUNIS Habitat Classification
text: eunis.habitats R data package provides EUNIS Habitat Classification tidy format.

title: EUNIS Habitat Classification
text: Install CRAN: can install development version eunis.habitats like :

title: EUNIS Habitat Classification
text: four EUNIS classifications included one single data set eunis_habitats, namely: EUNIS classification 2007, revised 2012. EUNIS marine classification 2019 EUNIS marine classification 2022 EUNIS terrestrial classification 2021 example, access marine habitats classified according EUNIS revision 2022: Check documentation details: ?eunis_habitats.
code: subset(eunis_habitats, classification == "EUNIS_M_2022") #> # A tibble: 1,942 × 8 #>    classification section version group   level code    name         description #>    <chr>          <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <int> <chr>   <chr>        <chr>       #>  1 EUNIS_M_2022   marine  2022    benthic     1 M       Marine bent… "Marine be… #>  2 EUNIS_M_2022   marine  2022    benthic     2 MA1     Littoral ro… "Littoral … #>  3 EUNIS_M_2022   marine  2022    benthic     3 MA11    Arctic litt… "Arctic li… #>  4 EUNIS_M_2022   marine  2022    benthic     3 MA12    Atlantic li… "Atlantic … #>  5 EUNIS_M_2022   marine  2022    benthic     4 MA121   Lichens or … "Lichen co… #>  6 EUNIS_M_2022   marine  2022    benthic     5 MA1211  Yellow and … "Vertical … #>  7 EUNIS_M_2022   marine  2022    benthic     5 MA1212  Prasiola st… "Exposed t… #>  8 EUNIS_M_2022   marine  2022    benthic     5 MA1213  Verrucaria … "Bedrock o… #>  9 EUNIS_M_2022   marine  2022    benthic     6 MA12131 Verrucaria … "The litto… #> 10 EUNIS_M_2022   marine  2022    benthic     6 MA12132 Verrucaria … "Upper lit… #> # ℹ 1,932 more rows

title: EUNIS Habitat Classification
text: EUNIS 2012 EUNIS Marine 2022: EUNIS Marine 2019 EUNIS 2012: EUNIS Marine 2022 European Red List Habitats: EUNIS Marine 2019 Habitats Directive Annex :
code: crosswalk(   code = c("A3.4", "A3.5"),   from = "EUNIS_2012",   to = "EUNIS_M_2022",   unnest = TRUE ) #> # A tibble: 64 × 2 #>    eunis_2012_code eunis_m_2022_code #>    <chr>           <chr>             #>  1 A3.4            MA133             #>  2 A3.4            MA134             #>  3 A3.4            MA135             #>  4 A3.4            MA136             #>  5 A3.4            MA137             #>  6 A3.4            MB13              #>  7 A3.4            MB131             #>  8 A3.4            MB1311            #>  9 A3.4            MB1312            #> 10 A3.4            MB1313            #> # ℹ 54 more rows crosswalk( code = c("MH152", "MH2331"), from = "EUNIS_M_2019", to = "EUNIS_2012", unnest = TRUE ) #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   eunis_m_2019_code eunis_2012_code #>   <chr>             <chr>           #> 1 MH152             A7.12           #> 2 MH2331            A7.231 crosswalk( code = c("MH152", "MH2331", "MA146", "MD55"), from = "EUNIS_M_2022", to = "RL", unnest = TRUE ) #> # A tibble: 4 × 2 #>   eunis_m_2022_code rl_code #>   <chr>             <chr>   #> 1 MH152             <NA>    #> 2 MH2331            <NA>    #> 3 MA146             A1.1xx  #> 4 MD55              A5.27 crosswalk( code = c("M", "MA1", "MA11", "MA12"), from = "EUNIS_M_2019", to = "Annex_I", unnest = TRUE ) #> # A tibble: 7 × 2 #>   eunis_m_2019_code annex_i_code #>   <chr>             <chr>        #> 1 M                 <NA>         #> 2 MA1               <NA>         #> 3 MA11              <NA>         #> 4 MA12              8330         #> 5 MA12              1160         #> 6 MA12              1170         #> 7 MA12              1130

title: EUNIS Habitat Classification
text: original data EUNIS Habitat Classification.

title: Convert habitat codes — crosswalk
text: Convert (crosswalk) habitat codes , , following habitat classification systems: EUNIS habitat classification: "EUNIS_2012", "EUNIS_M_2019", "EUNIS_M_2022" "EUNIS_T_2021". See eunis_habitats habitat codes, names descriptions. European Red List Habitats: "RL". Habitats Directive Annex : "Annex_I". Note pairwise combinations available. possibilities originally provided EUNIS raw data.

title: Convert habitat codes — crosswalk
text: code character vector habitat codes. values existing codes classification system indicated parameter. source classification system. one : "EUNIS_2012", "EUNIS_M_2019", "EUNIS_M_2022", "EUNIS_T_2021", "RL" "Annex_I". target classification system. Also, one options indicated parameter description. unnest Whether unnest "" column output. Note unnest number rows output (potentially) greater number habitat codes provided parameter code, meaning one--many crosswalks one row .

title: Convert habitat codes — crosswalk
text: tibble two variables codes, respectively. actual column names vary according specific crosswalk queried, see Examples.

title: Convert habitat codes — crosswalk
code: # From EUNIS 2012 to EUNIS Marine 2022 crosswalk(   code = c("A3.4", "A3.5"),   from = "EUNIS_2012",   to = "EUNIS_M_2022",   unnest = TRUE ) #> # A tibble: 64 × 2 #>    eunis_2012_code eunis_m_2022_code #>    <chr>           <chr>             #>  1 A3.4            MA133             #>  2 A3.4            MA134             #>  3 A3.4            MA135             #>  4 A3.4            MA136             #>  5 A3.4            MA137             #>  6 A3.4            MB13              #>  7 A3.4            MB131             #>  8 A3.4            MB1311            #>  9 A3.4            MB1312            #> 10 A3.4            MB1313            #> # ℹ 54 more rows  # From EUNIS Marine 2019 to EUNIS 2012 crosswalk( code = c("MH152", "MH2331"), from = "EUNIS_M_2019", to = "EUNIS_2012", unnest = TRUE ) #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   eunis_m_2019_code eunis_2012_code #>   <chr>             <chr>           #> 1 MH152             A7.12           #> 2 MH2331            A7.231           # From EUNIS Marine 2022 to Red List crosswalk( code = c("MH152", "MH2331", "MA146", "MD55"), from = "EUNIS_M_2022", to = "RL", unnest = TRUE ) #> # A tibble: 4 × 2 #>   eunis_m_2022_code rl_code #>   <chr>             <chr>   #> 1 MH152             NA      #> 2 MH2331            NA      #> 3 MA146             A1.1xx  #> 4 MD55              A5.27    # From EUNIS Marine 2019 to Annex I crosswalk( code = c("M", "MA1", "MA11", "MA12"), from = "EUNIS_M_2019", to = "Annex_I", unnest = TRUE ) #> # A tibble: 7 × 2 #>   eunis_m_2019_code annex_i_code #>   <chr>             <chr>        #> 1 M                 NA           #> 2 MA1               NA           #> 3 MA11              NA           #> 4 MA12              8330         #> 5 MA12              1160         #> 6 MA12              1170         #> 7 MA12              1130          # From Annex I to EUNIS Marine 2019 crosswalk( code = c("8330", "1160"), from = "Annex_I", to = "EUNIS_M_2019", unnest = TRUE ) #> # A tibble: 966 × 2 #>    annex_i_code eunis_m_2019_code #>    <chr>        <chr>             #>  1 8330         MA12              #>  2 8330         MA127             #>  3 8330         MA1271            #>  4 8330         MA1272            #>  5 8330         MA1273            #>  6 8330         MA1274            #>  7 8330         MA1275            #>  8 8330         MA1276            #>  9 8330         MA12761           #> 10 8330         MA1277            #> # ℹ 956 more rows  # From EUNIS Terrestrial 2021 to Annex I crosswalk( code = c("U51", "U72", "Q25"), from = "EUNIS_T_2021", to = "Annex_I", unnest = TRUE ) #> # A tibble: 6 × 2 #>   eunis_t_2021_code annex_i_code #>   <chr>             <chr>        #> 1 U72               3250         #> 2 U72               3280         #> 3 U72               3290         #> 4 Q25               7140         #> 5 Q25               7130         #> 6 U51               NA            # From Annex I to EUNIS Terrestrial 2021 crosswalk(   code = c("91E0", "92A0", "9030"),   from = "Annex_I",   to = "EUNIS_T_2021", unnest = TRUE   ) #> # A tibble: 6 × 2 #>   annex_i_code eunis_t_2021_code #>   <chr>        <chr>             #> 1 92A0         T11               #> 2 92A0         T14               #> 3 9030         T12               #> 4 9030         T1C               #> 5 91E0         T11               #> 6 91E0         T12

title: eunis.habitats: EUNIS Habitat Classification — eunis.habitats-package
text: EUNIS habitat classification comprehensive pan-European system habitat identification https://www.eea.europa.eu/data--maps/data/eunis-habitat-classification-1. R data package providing EUNIS classification system. classification hierarchical covers types habitats natural artificial, terrestrial freshwater marine. habitat types identified specific codes, names descriptions come schema crosswalks habitat typologies.

title: eunis.habitats: EUNIS Habitat Classification — eunis.habitats-package
text: Maintainer: Ramiro Magno rmagno@pattern.institute (ORCID) Authors: Pedro Monteiro pmontei@ualg.pt (ORCID) Luís Bentes lbentes@ualg.pt (ORCID) contributors: Pattern Institute [copyright holder, funder] CCMAR [copyright holder, funder]

title: EUNIS Habitats — eunis_habitats
text: data set EUNIS habitats. row habitat. EUNIS habitat classification comprehensive pan-European system habitat identification. classification hierarchical covers types habitats natural artificial, terrestrial freshwater marine. habitat types identified specific codes, names descriptions come cross-walks habitat typologies. See crosswalk() mapping habitat classification systems.

title: EUNIS Habitats — eunis_habitats
text: tibble eight variables: classification Classification identifier. Identifies one four habitat classifications. section Component EUNIS classification: "marine" "terrestrial". version Classification version. group Habitat group. level Habitat level. code Habitat code. name Habitat name. description Habitat description.

title: EUNIS Habitats — eunis_habitats
text: https://www.eea.europa.eu/data--maps/data/eunis-habitat-classification-1

title: EUNIS Habitats — eunis_habitats
text: full list EUNIS habitats 2012: codes, scientific names revised descriptions. habitat descriptions EUNIS classification 2007 revised 2012. 2007 habitat types changed 2012 description revision mostly replaced Palaearctic UK Marine habitat classification codes used habitat descriptions levels 5 EUNIS classification equivalents. 2019 classification amended include two new habitats revised Resolution 4 Bern Convention adopted 38th Standing Committee meeting, November 2018. two habitats G3.4G Pinus sylvestris forest chalk steppe zone X36 Depressions (pody) Steppe zone.

title: EUNIS Habitats — eunis_habitats
text: revision EUNIS marine habitat classification published 2019. June 2021 classification complemented crosswalks Habitats Directive Annex European Red List Habitats. updated version published March 2022. Users change 2022 version earliest convenience.

title: EUNIS Habitats — eunis_habitats
text: review marine component EUNIS habitat classification initiated 2014. Marine benthic habitats, marine pelagic marine ice associated habitats separated three distinct groups, separate classification structure. first major division benthic marine part EUNIS classification based major biological zones (related depth) substrate type. Level 3 classification reflects main biogeographical regions Europe’s seas based distinct combinations salinity temperature regimes (Arctic, Baltic, Atlantic, Mediterranean Black Sea). first review published 2019 update version concerning mostly Atlantic regional sea available since March 2022. Crosswalks Habitats Directive Annex European Red List Habitats available crosswalks EUNIS marine habitats version 2012 regional seas apart Atlantic need revisited.

title: EUNIS Habitats — eunis_habitats
text: review terrestrial component EUNIS habitat classification initiated 2015. review concerns groups coastal habitats, grasslands, heathland, forest, sparsely vegetated vegetated man-made habitats. review updated January 2023 corrections existing groups inclusion wetlands additional crosslinks. remaining groups revised published later stage. classification includes cross-walks level 3 Habitats Directive Annex , European Red List Habitats, Bern Convention Resolution 4 habitats, MAES IUCN ecosystems, Corine Land Cover classes Euroveg Checklist 2016 Syntaxa. groups forest heathland include also crosswalks earlier revision groups published 2017. Habitats level 3 complemented lists characteristic species identified EVA database.

title: EUNIS Habitats — eunis_habitats
